stripped_text: Install only in the root of R&D. click: Reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Secretly choose 1 to add to HQ. Return the others to the top of R&D, in any order. Limit 1 region per server.
text: Install only in the root of R&D. [click]: Reveal the top 3 cards of R&D. Secretly choose 1 to add to HQ. Return the others to the top of R&D, in any order. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Bamboo Dome
